title: SX Network <> Dapp Radar Integration
body:
Dapp Radar is the premier data source for tracking, analyzing and discovering Dapps, over the past year they have been a strong marketing partner for SportX.

This proposal will continue our relationship with Dapp Radar by integrating SX Network into their blockchain dapp tracking section along with marketing support.

PROPOSAL:
In 2021 Dapp Radar will integrate SX Network as a trackable chain similar to ETH, Polygon, BSC, etc. ex: https://dappradar.com/rankings

All SX Network dapps will be added and any new dapps can be added free of charge through the Dapp Radar portal.

Before the integration goes live in December of 2021, Dapp Radar’s editorial team will cover upcoming launch on their blog and social media channels.

At the time of integration Dapp Radar will launch a marketing campaign and educational content about the integration of SX Network to Dapp Radar.

$20,000 worth of market credits for SportX will be included in the deal.

Following the integration Dapp radar will continue to provide media and blog coverage on SX Network and its dapp integrations.

Dapp Radar will include SX Network in its quarterly industry reports.

COST: $80,000 USDC
author: 0xb55f963eB83D71CEDe186706460BC8DaAA6D2DF2
